text: Shart is the name of several Bollywood and Tollywood movies. *Shart (1954), directed by Bibhuti Mitra, starring Deepak and Shashikala *Shart (1969), directed by Kewal Misra, starring Sanjay Khan and Mumtaz *Shart (1986), directed by Ketan Anand, starring Naseeruddin Shah and Shabana Azmi *Shart: The Challenge (2004), directed by Puri Jagannadh, starring Amrita Arora and Snehal Dabi
title: Shart
